summary: This is an email chain from December 10, 2018, between individuals involved in the Epstein case, including an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and a detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force. The emails discuss scheduling a call to prepare for an upcoming event on Wednesday and include an attachment of SOMU records.

persons.name: Mimi
persons.context: Sends an email requesting a brief call in the afternoon to touch base about items in preparation for Wednesday.

events.title: Preparation for Wednesday event
events.description: Mentioned as a reason for scheduling a call to discuss items in preparation.

keyFacts: The email chain involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and a detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.
The correspondence is dated December 10, 2018, and references preparation for an event on the upcoming Wednesday.
An attachment titled 'E-Justice_SOMU_profile.pdf' containing SOMU records is mentioned.
